column4: I was wondering if after all these years you'd like to meet
column5: 我犹豫着要不要给你来电 不确定多年后你是否还愿相见
column7: 愿意闲聊寒暄 细数从前
column8: They say that time's supposed to heal ya but I ain't done much healing
column9: 人们都说时间能治愈一切 但我却似乎没有更好一点
column13: I'm in California dreaming about who we used to be
column14: 我在加州梦见我们过去的种种美好
column15: When we were younger and free
column16: 当时那年轻而向往自由的我们
column17: I've forgotten how it felt before the world fell at our feet
column18: 我都快要忘了 但现实却让一切重现眼前
column19: There's such a difference between us
column20: 我们之间的差距愈见明显
column24: 我还是想打给你 即使相隔天边
column25: I must've called a thousand times to tell you
column26: 即使打上千遍万遍我也想给你来电
column29: 对我从前所有的一切说声抱歉
column30: But when I call you never seem to be home
column31: 但我每次来电 似乎都是忙音不断没人接
column34: At least I can say that I've tried to tell you
column35: 至少能让我不留遗憾地告诉你
column38: 抱歉我曾让你心碎成片
column40: it clearly doesn't tear you apart anymore
column41: 但值得庆幸 不会再有人让你悲痛欲绝
column45: It's so typical of me to talk about myself
column46: 我已经习惯了自说自话帮你回答
column49: 也希望你现在能好过一点
column50: Did you ever make it out of that town
column51: 不知你是否已忘记那小城
column53: 那不再有故事发生的小城
column56: That the both of us are running out of time
column57: 我们都荒废了从前的那些时间
column58: So hello from the other side
column59: 所以这来自远方的我的来电
column60: I must've called a thousand times to tell you
column61: 即使打上千遍万遍我也想对你说

column68: 但我每次来电 似乎都是忙音不断没人接
